At this time, the bamboo pole is N_1 from this point and N_2 from the tree, then the height of the tree is ()
raw_answer: 解:如图所示:∵AB⊥OD,CD⊥OD,∴AB∥CD,∴△OAB∽△OCD,∴\frac{AB}{CD}=\frac{OB}{0D},即\frac{2}{CD}=\frac{5}{5+10},解得:CD=6(米)；即树的高度为6m；故选:B．
